strings.string: Version 2.43c of Datarun premium with 7 metrics, main version (dummy setting)
___Time items___
___Distance items___
___Miscellaneous items___
___Pace items___
___ETA items___
___Speed items___
___Heartrate items___
___Cadence items___
___Power items___
___Workout items___
___Performance indicator items___
___Altitude and temperature items___
Timer field
Timer
Current lap time
Last lap time
Average lap time
Distance field
Total distance
Current lap distance
Last lap distance
Average lap distance
Upper left field
Upper right field
Middle left field
Middle middle field
Middle right field
Bottom left field
Bottom right field
Metric in upper clock/lap field
Calculation of ETA based on elapsed time of last lap, instead of total average speed
Current pace
Overall average pace
Current lap pace
Last lap pace
Altitude
Aerobic training effect
Estimated time of arrival
Estimated finished time based on average or last lap pace
Deviation from required finish in hours, minutes and seconds
Required pace to meet required finish time
Elevation gain
Elevation loss
Show current pace as Rounded Pace
Use 5 colors for coloring of pace field in middle row, instead of 3 colors
Use average pace for coloring of the pace field in middle row, instead of pace based on desired finish time
Show demo view for ID's and check license
Use black background instead of white
Force backlight on, regardless of device settings
Alternative for default military clock in upper field
Keep clock with military time
Show number of laps
Show clock with AM or PM instead of military time
Show metric
Enter license key
Not valid, only numbers allowed!
C-Code generated on the watch by the corresponding main Datarun premium datafield
Enter race distance in meters or thousands of a mile (imperial/statute watch settings) for estimated finish time
Not valid, only numbers allowed!
Enter desired finish time for estimated deviation of finish time (format like 03:59:00 required!)
Heartrate field on middle row
Heartrate
HR averaged over the last 3 seconds
Heartrate zone
Average heartrate
Current lap heartrate
Last lap heartrate
Functional treshold power, needed for Intensity factor and Training stress score
Critical power, needed for Running Stress Score
Intensity Factor
Training Stress Score
Running Stress Score
Boundaries of a static powerzone for warning signal, a format required like (227:284)
Frequency for the warning signal for operating out of powerzone
Play sound as warning signal for operating out of powerzone
Use lap power for alerts instead of current power
Power metric for alerts
Current running power
Power averaged over the last 3 seconds
Power averaged over the last 5 seconds
>Power averaged over the last 10 seconds
Power averaged over the last ... seconds (max is 300 seconds, this metric also needs to be chosen on display!)
Lap power
Average power
Font color for power alerts, when under powerzone
Font color for power alerts, when above powerzone
Green
Blue
Dark gray
White
Purple
Red
Black
Dark blue
Pace averaged over the last 3 seconds
Pace averaged over the last 5 seconds
Pace averaged over the last .. seconds (max is 300 seconds)
Vertical speed averaged over the last 5 seconds
Pace or/and speed averaged over the last ... seconds (max is 300 seconds)
This needs to be a number from 2 too 300
Pace in seconds per 100 meter (for track running)
Speed in km/mile per hour
Speed averaged over the last 3 seconds in km/mile per hour
Speed averaged over the last 5 seconds in km/mile per hour
Speed averaged over the last .. seconds in km/mile per hour (max is 300 seconds)
Lap speed in km/mile per hour
Last lap speed in km/mile per hour
Average speed in km/mile per hour
Cadence in steps per minute
Cadence in rotations per minute (for bike use)
Average cadence
Current lap cadence
Last lap cadence
Average efficiency factor
Average efficiency index
Current lap efficiency factor
Current lap efficiency index
Last lap average efficiency factor
Last lap efficiency index
Current running power
Power averaged over the last 3 seconds
Power averaged over the last 5 seconds
Power averaged over the last 10 seconds
Power averaged over the last .. seconds
Power averaged over the last ... seconds (max is 300 seconds)
This needs to be a number from 2 too 300
Normalized power
Average running power
Current lap running power
Last lap running power
Maximum produced power during activity
Power zones, a format required like 184:Z1:227:Z2:255:Z3:284:Z4:326:Z5:369
Use 10 power zones instead of 5
Power zones for 10 zone system, a format required like Power zones, a format required like 180:Z1:210:Z2:240:Z3:270:Z4:300:Z5:330:Z6:360:Z7:390:Z8:420:Z9:450:Z10:480
Current efficiency factor
Current efficiency index
Current power to heartrate ratio
Lap power to heartrate ratio
Last lap power to heartrate ratio
Average power to heartrate ratio
Current powerzone
Powerzone over the last 3 seconds
Powerzone over the last 5 seconds
Powerzone over the last 10 seconds
Powerzone for the current lap
Powerzone for the last lap
Powerzone based on overall average power
Current power in percentage of FTP
Power averaged over 3 seconds in percentage of FTP
Lap power in percentage of FTP
Last lap power in percentage of FTP
Average power in percentage of FTP
Power averaged over 5 seconds in percentage of FTP
Power averaged over 10 seconds in percentage of FTP
Power averaged over .. seconds in percentage of FTP (depends on the value of power averaged over the last ... seconds [max is 300 seconds]
Disable colored label for upper left metric
Disable colored label for upper right metric
Disable colored label for middle left metric
Disable colored label for middle middle metric
Disable colored label for middle right metric
Disable colored label for bottom left metric
Disable colored label for bottom right metric
Distance to next point
Distance to destination
Current HR in percentage of MaxHR
Lap HR in percentage of MaxHR
Last lap HR in percentage of MaxHR
Average HR in percentage of MaxHR
Used kilocalories
Pace of last lap in seconds per 100 meter (for track running)
Current watch temperature
Current Tempe temperature (requires Tempe!)
Calibration factor for Tempe temperature in tenths of degrees F or C (3 means 0.3 added, -4 means 0.4 subtracted)
Use Fahrenheit instead of Celsius for temperature metrics (Celsius is default)
Use Garmin color scheme for label colors (not applicable for Palladino 10 powerzones)
Weight in kilo's (needed for Running Effectiveness as used by Steve Palladino)
Current Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
Rolling average over the last 3 seconds of Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
Rolling average over the last 5 seconds of Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
Lap Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
Average Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
Powertarget in Watt, useful when power correction is set only to influence powertarget
Powertarget in Watt as set in settings or defined by a workout, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
Use correction factors for running power only to change powertarget
Power correction based on temperature
No correction
Correction based on Tempe temperature (no correction for temperature during first 5 minutes!)
Correction based on manual set temperature (manually set in settings)
Temperature in F or C by which Critical power or FTP is determined, for power correction based on temperature
Current temperature in F or C, for power correction based on temperature (manual setting instead of being delivered by Tempe)
Calculated power correction percentage based on temperature
Power correction based on humidity
No correction
Correction based on manual set humidity
Current humidity in %, for power correction based on humidity
Humidity in % by which Critical power or FTP is determined, for power correction based on humidity
Power correction based on altitude
No correction
Correction based on altitude generated by barometer or GPS (watch decides independently which source it will be)
Correction based on manual set altitude
Current altitude, for power correction based on altitude
Altitude at which Critical power or FTP is determined, for power correction based on altitude
C-Code generated on the watch by the corresponding main Datarun premium datafield
Lower power boundary of a workout step (not for F5x), from Training peaks etc, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
Upper power boundary of a workout step (not for F5x), from Training peaks etc, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
Lower power boundary of a workout step in % van FTP (not for F5x), from Training peaks etc, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
Upper power boundary of a workout step in % van FTP (not for F5x), from Training peaks etc, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
Current step number of a workout (not for F5x)
Remaining time or distance of the current step of a workout (not for F5x)
Use a static powerzone for alerts, not powerzones from workout steps
Show red clock over all metrics before the start of an activity (useful for a race when the normal clock isn't visible)
Battery percentage
Vertical ascent averaged over the whole activity (in meters/minute or feet/minute depending on watch settings)
Vertical ascent averaged over the whole activity (in meters/hour or feet/hour depending on watch settings)
Vertical speed averaged over the last 30 seconds (in meters/hour or feet/hour depending on watch settings)
Vertical speed averaged over the last 30 seconds (in meters/minute or feet/minute depending on watch settings)
RunningDynamics instantaneous ground contact balance (0 - 100%, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
RunningDynamics instantaneous ground contact time (in milliseconds, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
RunningDynamics % ground contact time/stance time (0 - 100%, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
DOESN'T ALWAYS WORK RunningDynamics step length (in meters or feet depending on watch settings , requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
RunningDynamics instantaneous vertical oscillation (in mm, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
RunningDynamics vertical ratio (0 - 100%, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
Vertical ascent averaged over the whole activity (in meters/minute or feet/minute depending on watch settings)
Vertical ascent averaged over the whole activity (in meters/hour or feet/hour depending on watch settings)
Elapsed time (actual time minus start of timer moment)
Apply workaround for bug in cadance metrics being halved (currently for Fenix 6 and FR945 LTE)
